definition.text: The Docs have 3 different categories of pages. Node, Concept and Topic. Each of them is a collection of pages users can read.

paragraphs.text: For each Node defined within the project, there is a Docs Node Page at the Docs, explaining what is that Node used for.
Concepts are things users must know that are not needed as a Node in the system and are not ellaborate enough to become a topic.
Topics are multi-faceted concepts that needs more than one page to be correctly explained. It is a set of closely related concepts.
